actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Astronautics
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.

official_title: A bill to extend for 3 years the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to carry out the fire research and safety programs.

summary.text: Extends for three years the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to carry out fire research and safety programs. Authorizes appropriations totalling $125,000,000 for such programs for fiscal years 1974-1976.

titles.title: A bill to extend for 3 years the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to carry out the fire research and safety programs.
